title: 'FOMO' Author, Pinewood Atlanta Studios CEO
itunes:title: 'FOMO' Author, Pinewood Atlanta Studios CEO
description:
Patrick McGinnis discusses his book "Fear of Missing Out: Practical Decision-Making in a World of Overwhelming Choice." Frank Patterson, President and CEO of Pinewood Atlanta Studios, explains where the movie industry stands as quarantine orders start to lift.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
